    Architecture

Performance

Time

wall-clock time, response time, elapsed time, CPU time

CPU Time

CPU Time = CPU time spent for a given program = Cycles/Program (=Clock Cycles) * Seconds/Cycle (=Clock Cycle Time) = Instructions/Programs (=IC) * Cycles Instruction (=CPI) * Seconds/Cycle
